ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
Class LegendStyleController

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.LegendStyleController

public class LegendStyleController
extends Controller

This class is responsible for controlling access to the legend styles.

Author:
Eric Marinier
